name: Flex/Flash Contacts Grabber and Inviter
short_description:
The First and Only Flex/Flash contacts inviter.
A small (plug-n-play) component to integrate into your flex/flash project which enables your visitors to invite their contacts from Hotmail,Live,MSN,Yahoo, & Gmail.
